Array: neutral`*\they,^05 i'm trying to get rid of\n\tstuff,^05 not get more.
wink`*\tmaybe if we get back to the\n\tunderground,^05 we can see if my\n\tbrother wants anything.
wink`*\they,^05 i don't think i asked\n\twhat your name was.
closed`*\t...^10 kris,^05 huh.
neutral`*\tthat's cool.
wink`*\ti'm sans.^10\n*\tsans the skeleton.
closed`*\tbut you already knew that.
closed`*\tand because you already\n\tknew that,^05 i'm gonna tell you\n\tsomething that you <color=#FFFF00FF>don't know</color>.
closed`*\t...
side`*\tactually wait a sec,^05 we only\n\tjust met like 20 minutes ago.
wink`*\tdon't you know that friendship\n\ttakes time?
neutral`*\tbesides,^05 don't you have\n\tanything <color=#FFFF00FF>more important</color> to do?
rolleye`*\twell,^05 i found a buncha\n\tstuff when i fell,^05 and i don't\n\thave any use for it.
wink`*\tso hey,^05 why not give it\n\tto someone else?
neutral`*\thuh?^10\n*\twhy aren't they free?
side`*\ti've gotta pay bills somehow.
neutral`*\toh yeah, that label on the\n\tbats that i found.

side`*	well,^05 some weapons behave
	differently in battles,^05 and
	have different names for their
	types.

closed`*	for example,^05 susie's stick
	is a SLASH weapon,^05 and it does
	the stuff that you already
	know about.

rolleye`*	and noelle's ring is an ICERING.^05
*	it doesn't hit very well,^05
	but she can use her
	MAGIC in battle.
neutral`*\tand the bat is a BASH weapon.

closed`*	that basically means that it's
	usually pretty strong,^05 but aiming
	gradually speeds up.^05
*	might be harder to use.
wink`*\tof course,^05 you won't need it\n\tif you're being nice to everyone.

neutral`*	so i was wandering around
	that twoson town,^05 and some
	weirdo came up to me and
	asked where my red cap was.
rolleye`*\tthen he tried to punch me\n\tand showed me a ruler before\n\the ran off.
wink`*\tneedless to say,^05 but that\n\twas weird.
side`*\toh,^05 right,^05 the red-capped\n\tkid.
neutral`*\ti guess it's some kid that's\n\ttryna save the world.
closed`*\tnot unlike you in some aspects.
